casebody.data:
Jeffrey FERGUSON, petitioner,
v.
Troy STEELE, Warden. No. 13-9274 (13A952). Supreme Court of the United States March 25, 2014.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice ALITO

*1582and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
